title: Graphis / Lineto
content:
Swiss type foundry Lineto has a short article in the current issue of Graphis.   
Excellent design for a matching price.   
www.lineto.com
author: designalchemy

comments.content:
thanks for the link! I was thrown by the site design at first. whether it's in-progress or intentionally old-school in it's approach, it works very well as is.   
   
the type is quite nice. the low-tech revivals are done with a lot of personal style (the site design makes infinitely more sense once you see their fonts). I'm not quite sure about their \*text\* label. I suppose text might be acceptable nomenclature in web terms, but I'm not going to be using them anytime soon for any of my upcoming book jobs!
It's intentional. I like it, too.
